# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
CCGS Henry Larsen Dry Dock Apr-June 2023

## Tender Information
* Reference Number: PW-OLZ-002-7913
* Solicitation Number: F6855-221005/A
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-28T12:30:52
* Tender Status: Expired

## Tender Description
The Government of Canada has issued a call for tenders for the dry docking and refitting of the CCGS Henry Larsen from April 21 to June 30, 2023. The scope of work includes all necessary repairs, inspections, and renewals as specified in the attached statement of work (Annex "A").

## Viewing and Bid Submission
A viewing of the vessel will be conducted on March 9, 2023, starting at 8:30 am at the Coast Guard Base in St. John's, NL. All bidders must notify the contracting authority at least 3 days in advance with the names of the individuals attending on behalf of their company. The viewing will also be conducted on March 9, starting at 1:30 pm.

## Trade Agreement and Procurement Strategy
This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The procurement strategy is competitive, and all interested suppliers may submit a bid. The lowest/lower bid will be selected as the preferred supplier.
